name: vardict_v1.5.0
title: Vardict variant caller v1.5.0
summary: v1.5.0 - (VarDict somatic variant caller for use on SWIFT NGS sequencing output).

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: Bedfile
inputSpec.help: BED file or amplicon BED file.

inputSpec.name: ref_genome
inputSpec.label: reference genome
inputSpec.help: The reference fasta.  Should be indexed (.fai) [-G]

inputSpec.name: allele_freq
inputSpec.label: allele frequency threshold
inputSpec.help: The threshold for allele frequency, default: 0.01 or 1% [-f]

inputSpec.name: sample_name
inputSpec.label: Sample name
inputSpec.help: Sample name. Will overwrite sample name extracted from bam filenames [-N]

inputSpec.name: min_reads
inputSpec.label: min variance reads
inputSpec.help: The minimum # of variant reads, default 2 [-r]

inputSpec.name: reads_bias
inputSpec.label: min reads for strand bias
inputSpec.help: The minimum # of reads to determine strand bias, default 2 [-B]

inputSpec.name: col_chr
inputSpec.label: chromosome column
inputSpec.help: The column for chromosome in bedfile [-c]

inputSpec.name: col_start
inputSpec.label: region start column
inputSpec.help: The column for region start in bedfile [-S]

inputSpec.name: col_end
inputSpec.label: region end column
inputSpec.help: The column for region end in bedfile [-E]

inputSpec.name: col_gene
inputSpec.label: gene name column
inputSpec.help: The column for gene name in bedfile [-g]

inputSpec.name: local_realignment
inputSpec.label: local realignment
inputSpec.help: Perform local realignment.  Default: True.  For Ion or PacBio, 0 is recommended [-k]

inputSpec.name: extra_options
inputSpec.label: Extra command-line options
inputSpec.help: Extra command-line options to pass directly to vardict. Include flag. Example: -I indel size
